amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the presence of a new ISIL-specific Authorization for the Use of Military Force by April 30, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit the use of funds for the 2001 AUMF beginning on April 30, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 274 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 274 (Roll no. 330).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Ms. Lee.
